verses.verse: But <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
Hear <S%H8085>diligently<s%> <S%H8085><s%> my <S%H4405>speech,<s%> and let <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> your <S%H8575>consolations.<s%>
Suffer <S%H5375><s%> me that <S%H595>I<s%> may <S%H1696>speak;<s%> and after <S%H310>that<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> mock <S%H3932>on.<s%>
As for <S%H595>me,<s%> is my <S%H7879>complaint<s%> to <S%H120>man?<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> it were so, <S%H4069>why<s%> should <S%H3808>not<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> be <S%H7114>troubled?<s%>
Mark <S%H6437><s%> <S%H413><s%> me, and be <S%H8074>astonished,<s%> and <S%H7760>lay<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
Even <S%H518>when<s%> I <S%H2142>remember<s%> I am <S%H926>afraid,<s%> and <S%H6427>trembling<s%> taketh <S%H270>hold<s%> on my <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>
Wherefore <S%H4069><s%> do the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2421>live,<s%> become <S%H6275>old,<s%> <S%H1571>yea,<s%> are <S%H1396>mighty<s%> in <S%H2428>power?<s%>
Their <S%H2233>seed<s%> is <S%H3559>established<s%> in their <S%H6440>sight<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> them, and their <S%H6631>offspring<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
Their <S%H1004>houses<s%> are <S%H7965>safe<s%> from <S%H4480>fear,<s%> <S%H6343><s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> is the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them.
Their <S%H7794>bull<s%> <S%H5674>engendereth,<s%> and <S%H1602>faileth<s%> <S%H3808>not;<s%> their <S%H6510>cow<s%> <S%H6403>calveth,<s%> and casteth not her <S%H7921>calf.<s%> <S%H3808><s%>
They send <S%H7971>forth<s%> their little <S%H5759>ones<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock,<s%> and their <S%H3206>children<s%> <S%H7540>dance.<s%>
They <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H8596>timbrel<s%> and <S%H3658>harp,<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> at the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H5748>organ.<s%>
They <S%H3615>spend<s%> their <S%H3117>days<s%> in <S%H2896>wealth,<s%> and in a <S%H7281>moment<s%> go <S%H5181>down<s%> to the <S%H7585>grave.<s%>
Therefore they <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H5493>Depart<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> us; for we <S%H2654>desire<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of thy <S%H1870>ways.<s%>

What <S%H4100><s%> is the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> we should <S%H5647>serve<s%> him? and <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H3276>profit<s%> should we have, <S%H3588>if<s%> we <S%H6293>pray<s%> unto him?
Lo, <S%H2005><s%> their <S%H2898>good<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand:<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H7368>far<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me.

How <S%H4100>oft<s%> is the <S%H5216>candle<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> put <S%H1846>out!<s%> and how oft <S%H935>cometh<s%> their <S%H343>destruction<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them! God <S%H2505>distributeth<s%> <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> in his <S%H639>anger.<s%>
They <S%H1961>are<s%> as <S%H8401>stubble<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and as <S%H4671>chaff<s%> that the <S%H5492>storm<s%> carrieth <S%H1589>away.<s%>
God <S%H433><s%> layeth <S%H6845>up<s%> his <S%H205>iniquity<s%> for his <S%H1121>children:<s%> he <S%H7999>rewardeth<s%> <S%H413><s%> him, and he shall <S%H3045>know<s%> it.
His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H3589>destruction,<s%> and he shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4480>wrath<s%> <S%H2534><s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> hath he in his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, when the <S%H4557>number<s%> of his <S%H2320>months<s%> is cut off in the <S%H2686>midst?<s%>
Shall any <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge?<s%> seeing <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H8199>judgeth<s%> those that are <S%H7311>high.<s%>
One <S%H2088><s%> <S%H4191>dieth<s%> in his <S%H8537>full<s%> <S%H6106>strength,<s%> being <S%H3605>wholly<s%> at <S%H7946>ease<s%> and <S%H7961>quiet.<s%>
His <S%H5845>breasts<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2461>milk,<s%> and his <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H8248>moistened<s%> with <S%H4221>marrow.<s%>
And <S%H2088>another<s%> <S%H4191>dieth<s%> in the <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H398>eateth<s%> with <S%H2896>pleasure.<s%>
They shall lie <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H3162>alike<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and the <S%H7415>worms<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H5921><s%> them.
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H4284>thoughts,<s%> and the <S%H4209>devices<s%> which ye wrongfully <S%H2554>imagine<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me.

For <S%H3588><s%> ye <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H346>Where<s%> is the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H5081>prince?<s%> and <S%H346>where<s%> are the <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> <S%H168>places<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked?<s%>
Have ye <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> them that <S%H5674>go<s%> by the <S%H1870>way?<s%> and do ye <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5234>know<s%> their <S%H226>tokens,<s%>

That <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H7451>wicked<s%> is <S%H2820>reserved<s%> to the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H343>destruction?<s%> they shall be brought <S%H2986>forth<s%> to the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5678>wrath.<s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> his <S%H6440>face?<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H7999>repay<s%> him what <S%H1931>he<s%> hath <S%H6213>done?<s%>
Yet shall <S%H1931>he<s%> be <S%H2986>brought<s%> to the <S%H6913>grave,<s%> and shall <S%H8245>remain<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H1430>tomb.<s%>

The <S%H7263>clods<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> shall be <S%H4985>sweet<s%> unto him, and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> shall <S%H4900>draw<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, as there are <S%H369>innumerable<s%> <S%H4557><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.
How <S%H349><s%> then <S%H5162>comfort<s%> ye me in <S%H1892>vain,<s%> seeing in your <S%H8666>answers<s%> there <S%H7604>remaineth<s%> <S%H4604>falsehood?<s%>
